meanings.definition: The practice of keeping and caring for bees in hives.
meanings.sent1: Beekeepings involve tending to bees in special homes.
meanings.sent2: She learned about beekeepings from her grandfather.
meanings.sent3: The beekeepings in the backyard always keep the neighbors buzzing with excitement.
meanings.sent4: In the world of nature, beekeepings are like tiny cities bustling with activity.
meanings.sent5: The beekeepings hummed with life as the beekeeper checked on their well-being.

meanings.definition: The activity or occupation of managing colonies of bees for the purpose of producing honey.
meanings.sent1: Beekeepings require careful attention to ensure a good honey harvest.
meanings.sent2: He decided to start beekeepings as a hobby.
meanings.sent3: The beekeepings' sweet results made all the hard work worthwhile.
meanings.sent4: Amidst the beekeepings, the beekeeper found a golden treasure of honey.
meanings.sent5: The beekeepings' golden nectar was a testament to the beekeeper's dedication.
